alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 5:24PM MST until December 25 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Hill County, Northern Blaine County and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Though currently not expected, if ground blizzard conditions develop an upgrade the Winter Weather Advisory will be upgraded to a Blizzard Warning. In addition, a brief period of rain, freezing rain, sleet, or snow may occur this evening and cause some minor travel difficulties before strong winds develop.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County
